name: @morpho/vendor
description: Adds automatic vendor prefixing for css properties based on browserslist and mdn-browser-compat-data

scripts.test: cross-env-shell ../../node_modules/.bin/nyc -i esm -r lcov ../../node_modules/.bin/testmatrix test/vendor.test.js && cross-env-shell ../../node_modules/.bin/nyc report

author: Brian Teague
